name: Intro to Journalism
description: This course introduces students to the fundamentals of Journalism. Topics covered include: media literacy, ethical considerations, and the fundamentals of media law.

name: Sports Journalism
description: This course introduces students to the field of Sports Journalism. Topics covered include: the history of Sports Journalism, its relationship to the larger field of journalism, and how to effectively cover a sporting event.

name: Advanced Sports Writing
description: This course builds on the fundamentals of Sports Journalism. Topics covered include: interviewing techniques, analysis and opinion writing, and data journalism.

name: Sports Media and Technology
description: This course introduces students to the intersection of sports and media/technology. Topics covered include: the impact of digital media on sports coverage, advanced techniques for using digital media for sports journalism, and the role of digital media in the sports industry.
